.. _pages/datasets:

BAD data sets
=============

BAD includes the following benchmark data sets.

All data sets are composed of numerical features only. All data sets are without duplicates.

============  =======  ============  ==============  =============================================================================================================================
 Name          Size     Dimensions    Multiversion    Description
============  =======  ============  ==============  =============================================================================================================================
 annthyroid    7129     21            no              Abnormal thyroid conditions `(source) <https://www.dbs.ifi.lmu.de/research/outlier-evaluation/DAMI/semantic/Annthyroid/>`_
 covertype     286048   10            no              Forest cover types `(source) <http://odds.cs.stonybrook.edu/forestcovercovertype-dataset/>`_
 glass         213      9             no              Forensics glass samples `(source) <http://odds.cs.stonybrook.edu/glass-data/>`_
 kdd99         48133    40            no              Intrusion detection data set `(source) <https://www.dbs.ifi.lmu.de/research/outlier-evaluation/DAMI/literature/KDDCup99/>`_
 pendigits     9868     16            yes             Hand-written digits `(source) <https://www.dbs.ifi.lmu.de/research/outlier-evaluation/DAMI/literature/PenDigits/>`_
 shuttle       1013     9             yes             Space shuttle sensor reading `(source) <https://www.dbs.ifi.lmu.de/research/outlier-evaluation/DAMI/literature/Shuttle/>`_
 wbc           377      30            no              Breast cancer screening `(source) <http://odds.cs.stonybrook.edu/wbc/>`_
 wine          129      13            no              Wine chemical analysis `(source) <http://odds.cs.stonybrook.edu/wine/>`_
============  =======  ============  ==============  =============================================================================================================================
